subject: Refactor testing to workflow-based logical assertions
body:
Replace numerical math tests with readable workflow-based tests that verify
displayed values are logically correct based on user actions and inputs.

Changes:
- Create ASSERTIONS library with reusable logical checks
- Each assertion has: field name, readable logic formula, description
- Define WORKFLOW_SCENARIOS that read like user stories
- Tests now verify "Developer Revenue = Cost × (1 + Markup)" logic
- Not testing math (1000 × 1.1 = 1100), testing business logic
- Update UI to display stories, workflow badges, and assertion formulas
